titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (H. R. 4587) making appropriations for the legislative branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1989, and against consideration of such conference report.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-995.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/28/1988--Introduced. Waives points of order against the conference report on H.R. 4587 (legislative branch appropriations) and against its consideration.
